---
FormVox is a file-based forms and polls app for Nextcloud. Unlike traditional form apps, FormVox stores everything in .fvform files - no database tables needed.
**ðŸ“‹ Requirements:** * PHP 8.1 or higher * Nextcloud 28-32
**Features:** * 100% file-based storage (.fvform files) * Multiple question types: text, textarea, single/multiple choice, dropdown, date, time, number, scale, rating, file upload, matrix * Conditional logic (branching) * Quiz mode with scoring * Export to CSV, JSON, Excel * Per-form branding with visual page builder * Answer piping (use previous answers in later questions) * Charts and visualizations in Results view * Password protection and expiration for public links
**Unique Benefits:** * One file contains everything (definition + responses) * Works with Nextcloud's versioning * End-to-end encryption compatible * No database migrations needed * Native Nextcloud sharing integration
**Perfect for:** * Surveys and feedback forms * Quizzes and assessments * Event registrations * Data collection with privacy requirements
Built with Vue 3 and modern web technologies for a smooth, secure experience.
